text: seongseuleoun dal-eul yeonjangham-eun bul sin-eul chugaham-ini ilo inhayeo bul sinjadeul-i jalmos indodoenila hanhaeneun heolagdoen haelo hamyeo han haeneun geumjidoen haelo hayeo hananim-i geumgihan dalgwa ilchisikigo hananim-i geumgihan geos-eul jeongdangke halyeo hani geudeul-ui haeng-wie bulhaeng-i iss-eulila ttohan hananim-eun bulsinhaneun mulileul indohaji ani hasinola
